document_data.mainbody:
Shalandain was a human paladin crusader member of the do-gooder group called the Company of the Chalice based on the Rock of Bral in the mid–14 century DR.
Shalandain wore a powerful magical +3 field plate, a +5 holy avenger long sword and a mundane shield. Other enchanted items of hers included boots of starstriding and potions of flying.
Shalandain belonged to a band of heroes who reverted to good and hunted down evil – the Company of the Chalice. Shalandain was the second-in-command of the groups Rock of Bral base that focused on crusades against the neogi.
